website_summaries.verdict: If you want to save a few dollars on your ugly sweater, this one is well-made, easy to care for, and tastefully awful – a great choice to get you noticed.
pros: An affordable sweater with a busy design – snowflakes, trees, lights, and more add to its ugly appeal
cons: Runs snug on most – choosing a size up should help prevent an uncomfortable fit

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: based on how disappointed my wife looked when i told her I'd be wearing this on Christmas Eve, this sweater is great.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Sleaves are longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I won my office sweater party with this lovely gem. Price is right and the fit was as advertised. My only gripe is that I wasn't able to get my dad-bod standard XL (only for the holidays I swear), so I hadto settle for the L. However, I did kinda wait until the very last possible minute to order the damn thing so I can't really talk that booty chatter. I payed for faster shipping and it was worth it. Definitely worth the price and the quality is on par with far more expensive sweaters than this one. The double sided graphics sealed the deal for me. Merry Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Utley

customer_reviews.title: My husband really liked this sweater
customer_reviews.text: My husband really liked this sweater! I bought both XL (his typical size) and XXL after reading the review that it ran small and I'm glad I did because the XXL had more room and fit him better. I would suggest going up a size if you don't want it to be too tight/too short. Overall great quality sweater for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove! Sizing is correct, no need to get smaller or larger size !!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Classically tasteless
customer_reviews.text: Classically tasteless, this garment will make you the center of attention at any social gathering, unless there’s some babies there in which case you’ve got no chance. It’s a bit big which is good if you want to stuff your face and still retain a degree of festive sex appeal
customer_reviews.author: P. Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: This is a great holiday sweater
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews on size before you buy and make the right choice. This is a great holiday sweater, got loads of compliments on it. Quite slim fitting IMO. Relatively soft, fingers crossed that keeps after a wash but frankly at this price you cant expect too much on a rarely worn holiday sweater.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It is cute.
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute ugly Xmas sweater. My husband liked it because it was not too hot and the yarn was not scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: iamdls

customer_reviews.title: Liked the first one so much, bought a second.
customer_reviews.text: Kudos for telling us the sizing based on the model. Due to that, the first one I ordered was perfect in Medium as I was close to the models size but had you not told me that info, I'd have likely purchased a large which would have been way too big. Also, I have long arms and the sleeve length was perfect for me too. I was so impressed with the quality of the first one I received I bought a second (different style). Love the quality, color and sizing of both (and price)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Love this Ugly sweater
customer_reviews.text: I got this sweater for a new family tradition, my 3 boys will add an extra piece of ugly to this sweater every year. I also plan on using this to win ugly sweater contest at my work. Sweater runs a full size smaller. I am 6’4” 250lb and wear a XL, I read other reviews and ordered a xxl fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Navy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not sure about fit
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is nice quality, thick and washed well. I am a woman but bought it to be bigger/longer to wear with leggings. I got an XXL and it not huge. I'm not sure it would fit a true xxl man. It did serve my purpose and looked how I wanted. My only complaint is the shoulders made me look like a football player. This really isn't the fault of the sweater,as it is made for a man who would probably have broader shoulders. Overall happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweater; a little slim fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL size which is normally fits a little big. I would describe this as a slim XL rather than a regular XL. It is not baggy! Otherwise a great sweater. Just what I wanted. !
customer_reviews.author: Eagle76

customer_reviews.title: Sweater reaked like BO and cologne
customer_reviews.text: When this sweater arrived and I tried it on, it literally smelled like someone returned it after they wore it because that thing reaked of BO and old men’s cologne. I had a party I was suppose to wear it to but i couldn’t because I was seriously gagging after wearing it for 5 minutes. I was extremely upset and it ruined my whole night. I asked my friends to smell it and everyone agreed with me that it must have been a return. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Kudos for telling us the sizing based on the model. That REALLY helped a huge amount. I got medium as I was close to the models size but had you not told me that info, I'd have likely purchased a large which would have been way too big. Also, I have long arms and the sleeve length was perfect for me too. Love the quality, color and sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Johnston

customer_reviews.title: This sweater had nice long sleeves and longer body without being too oversized ...
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about folks looking for a holiday sweater for a taller guy that wasn't ill fitting. My husband is 6'5" 210 lbs and usually wears XL - XXL Tall in clothing. This sweater had nice long sleeves and longer body without being too oversized in width to look like a sack. It was unusually nice fitting for a holiday party sweater. If they made this in regular, every day styles, I'd buy again. I definitely recommend if you're on the taller side. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny San Clemente

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Sweater was really good quality and the price was extremely reasonable. Actually far above my expectations. Feels really soft. Graphics are just as shown. Ran true to size as it is a normal loose sweater style. Note this is not a fitted sweater. I have not washed it yet but don't foresee any issues given the obvious quality. Since it won't be worn more then 2 or 3 times a year; I imagine it will last a lifetime lol. Would definetly reccomend. If they sold plain colored everyday sweaters I would be picking some up.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Soft and attractive, but weird sizing
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is soft and gorgeous, but unless you are built like Superman with skinny arms it might not fit. The chest and shoulder area is large and roomy; the sleeves are extra, extra long (can be rolled) but quite narrow and a snug fit on someone without guns; and the middle portion is definitely tapered and designed for a very trim waist and no belly. Sweaters should be roomy and comfortable. So disappointed in the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not really a man’s sweater.
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a Men’s XL. So based upon reviews, I order a size larger. Unfortunately, the XXL was skin tight on me and would have been uncomfortable to wear. Even though the picture showed a male model wearing, this is NOT something a guy would wear IMO. There are large cut “jewels” placed strategically that clearly was designed more for a woman, which, I believe, is why the size was so small. The sweater itself is fine, but I’m returning for small sizing and inaccurate description.
customer_reviews.author: Littlepup5

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Just received today, 12-15-18. Extremely satisfied. Sweater is fully knit, thick but not too thick however should definitely keep one warm while sipping egg nog. A huge plus I didn't expect is that the Merry Christmas is embroidered. Thank you Daisy Boutique. I will likely order from this seller again. Best wishes to all from Minnesota!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Meek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality made item, very soft fabric. Runs large for sizing. Arms & trunk of sweater are very long. I am 5'7" tall and the sweater hung 10 inches below my waist line. My primary. reason for return. The white color design at the bottom of the sweater did accent & bring attention to the long length.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Edd

customer_reviews.title: It is a really nice patern and color and the knit is very soft ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a 160lbs, 5' 5" woman and I ordered the medium based on the size chart, but the small would have been more appropriate. It is a really nice patern and color and the knit is very soft and comfortable. I wanted to exchange it but didn't see the option, and now I see that the price has increased. To the seller, can I exchange this sweater with no price increase?
customer_reviews.author: Mylie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just like it seems in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Good sweater, good material. This was a good buy. I was afraid I'd end up on Facebook with one of those posts about buying clothes online and it came way different or for a doll or something, but it's a sweater I wouldn't bought in the store. The back is all black even tho my husband would almost never ware stuff like this it he actually liked it and it wasn't to much for him. It'll last a long time too I think.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burgeson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XXL for my largish husband, I probably could have got away with the XL as these sweaters are generously sized, but it is wonderfully soft and bright and will look great next Christmas and anyway my husband likes loose comfortable clothing so I am very happy with it. Amazing low price too. I would highly recommend getting one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, handsome hubby for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality. My husband is a medium but prefers large. After reading through the reviews and seeing a lot of people saying these run quite large, I decided on med. It fits perfect. I prob could've gotten away with getting him a small but I think he preferred it this way.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Funny sweater - really the joke is not that noticeable ...
customer_reviews.text: Funny sweater - really the joke is not that noticeable to people until they look long and hard at it.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little tight!
customer_reviews.text: Well made but runs just a little small unless you are perfectly fit otherwise it hugs you body. Good for Younger men. Not so much for Wiser men. Mind you if you keep that gut sucked in and your chest poked out you should do fine. If you want it to fit comfortably then order a size bigger than your usual size and it will fit the way a sweater should. Cozy and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Little

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great Quality - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a better quality sweater than I expected. I needed an ugly sweater for a party, and I thought this would be low quality and thin. It was thick, comfortable and seemed well made! Definitely a great purchase for the price. I’m a 5’3” petite woman, and I wanted an oversized sweater. I bought a medium and it was the perfect oversized length for me. I also bought another design in medium for my boyfriend (5’10” and fit) and it fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Beads
customer_reviews.text: Very soft sweater. I like the design very much and I bought it so that I could wear it on "ugly sweater" occasions but also generally during the season. There are star beads on top of the trees and red beads with the candy canes - a bonus if you are looking for a ugly sweater, but for me I'd prefer it without so that I could wear it more often.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Real Person

customer_reviews.title: It even has a cellphone pocket!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater was just what I wanted. It is medium weight with a giant reindeer head on the front! It has a one inch strip of knitting that serves as the edge of the reindeer's cap. The reindeer's scarf is a knitted pocket which is the perfect size for a cellphone!
customer_reviews.author: P. H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ugly but cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother for his birthday and he loved it! When the nieces, nephews, cousins, etc. come at Christmas, all have ugly Christmas sweaters and as he is NOT a shopper, he felt left out.......not anymore!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price and novelty aspect, I wasn’t expecting much for comfort. But it was actually quite soft and comfortable. I wore it to a couple parties and got some nice comments about it. It is definitely fun. But feel confident that it’s not itchy and it’s quite soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kavi Chatoorgoon

customer_reviews.title: Rudolph the no nose reigndeer
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this product. Unfortunately when I got it I realized how low quality the nose was. It was attached to the sweater by 2 strings. The rest of the sweater was great quality though. The nose however fell off after one wash and the Rudolph looks like a psychopath now. I would be ashamed to wear it in public now. Very unfortunate purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sad Boy V

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy to have made the sweater is really beautiful and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this sweater for my son, I am very happy to have made the sweater is really beautiful and I was surprised by the quality, I have seen many others in stores whose quality is very poor, this however is very nice, warm and it will not disappoint you, the only thing to consider is the size, MY son normally uses Medium, I have asked for the small one and it was just his size, happy for the purchase
customer_reviews.author: GABRIELA

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Quality sweater! My husband is between and medium and large so I ordered the large and it fits him well, could have probably gotten a medium though.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Balla Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ugly Holiday Sweater Parties!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I cannot wait to wear this during the holiday season for all of the ugly christmas sweater parties. The little jewels are the icing on the cake for this sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Man

customer_reviews.title: Acrylic
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is acrylic. I ordered under incorrect impression that it was cotton or wool. I ordered 5 different sweaters from this manufacturer and they are all acrylic. It is cute, though
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Texas

customer_reviews.title: got tons of complements on this sweater and seems pretty well made
customer_reviews.text: got tons of complements on this sweater and seems pretty well made. fit perfectly and was actually pretty functional as a sweater. great for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby for his company Xmas party. He wanted something festive but not loud. This fits the bill. It fits his 2xl size perfectly. I wouldn’t call this an ugly sweater. He got a few compliments. It’s really nice with red nose and everything. Would totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Great novelty sweater ... not meant for layering.
customer_reviews.text: The sweater is soft and the colors vibrant. I was alerted that they run a tad small; they do a very little. My wife usually wears a L, which is roomy. This was also L and it fit her nicely (not too loose). Its a novelty and not meant for wearing layers. Great Buy
customer_reviews.author: John O'G

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love this soft lightweight sweater with the awesome design; reindeer. I usually wear large t shirts and almost bought a large sweater, but after looking at the sizing chart I ordered medium and glad I did. It fits great with plenty of room to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sweater for my husband to wear to an Ugly Sweater Christmas Party. It fit perfectly! He wears an XL. I was pleasantly surprised as to how soft it felt to the touch. It isn't really that "ugly" so I plan to add embellishments to make it more so. I think I will sew them on as to not ruin the sweater because I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: elkayjay

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not your typical cheesy wear it once Ugly Sweater Party sweater. I was impressed at how nice it was. Now... who gets to wear it next is the question, because it is too nice to donate or toss.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jock

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Oddly Proportioned
customer_reviews.text: This is a novelty item - don't expect it to be comfortable or look right on. I ordered a size larger than normal and it was still about a size too small. Order two sizes up!!! Its shape is also awkward - sleeves are really long and the color doesn't hang right. One button fell off on day one. It only survived one Christmas party.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Moore-Ward

customer_reviews.title: I won an ugly sweater contest (almost anyway)
customer_reviews.text: Dude I’m not gonna lie I didn’t expect much but this sweater is GREAT... it’s held up a few times in the washer/dryer and the material is way softer than I thought it would be! Well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Warinners

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, runs small
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best ugly sweater I’ve been able to find. Bought this for my son who usually wears a 2XL, I bought a 3XL and he definitely needed the bigger size. Quality is great. Haven’t washed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: SI

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much but when I tried it on I was extremely impressed. It fit well. I wear mostly medium tops with the occasional large. It was form fitting and warm. Almost too warm but that’s what a sweater is for. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roger F.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and funny
customer_reviews.text: This sweater was super cute and funny for an Ugly Sweater Party without being offensive(child’s involved). I’m 5’3” and 140 pounds, the small fit great and was long enough to wear with leggings(Christmas in Florida LOl). Sleeves are long so they don’t ride up your wrist. Definitely a keeper for angle Sweater parties.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Received several compliments - great "ugly" Xmas sweater, better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Liked it. Having nothing negative to say. :) Relatively inexpensive and better quality than expected. I thought I'd use it for the season and then have to trash it. But I washed it and it came out still looking good. I guess this will also be my 2020 Xmas Ugly sweater...
customer_reviews.author: B Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sweater
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sweater. Purchased for an "ugly" sweater party, although I think it's an adorable sweater. My husband thought it was cool looking & was excited to wear for the party.
customer_reviews.author: Venessa

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Ugly (?) Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Well made sweater. Fits as expected. Cute and not too ugly for a Christmas sweater, but odd enough to wear to an ugly Christmas sweater party. The 3D tongue flap and eyes on the tree make this holiday sweater unique.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater for the holidays!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like other comment, I got lots of compliments, very nice sweater and it’s quite comfy. I normally wear Medium but base on the reviews I ordered Small at it fits perfectly! I’m 5’6, 160 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Bensi Vistan

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning because it was too small. Seems like there are a good amount of comments about sizing running small. Seller should indicate that. I did however really like the sweater and it seemed very well made. Just wish the XXL was typical of others XXL sizes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Danczuk

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. No odor and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He normally wears an XL in T-shirts so that's what I ordered. It fit him perfectly. There was no odor upon arrival. He wore it to a Christmas party straight out of the the box (with an undershirt of course). He said it was very comfortable. He's happy so I'm happy.😊
customer_reviews.author: Tallygirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and doesn’t shrink
customer_reviews.text: Great sweater. Washed and dried and it didn’t shrink! Only downfall is the nose isn’t attached well and we ended up losing it on first wear. Would’ve put extra stitches in it if I’d known ahead of time. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mls

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly and is great quality, because of the price, I was skeptical, but this is perfect. 10 out of 10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mtt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price !!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are invited to a “Christmas sweater “ party every year . I saw it and thought it would be perfect and it is . My husband loves It. Beautifully made !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy d

customer_reviews.title: Quality sweater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sweater for my husband and he is a very muscular 6’3, 270 lb guy. I was worried sweater may be too tight. But the 2X worked out perfectly wasn’t snug at all nor was is baggy. I haven’t washed it yet as he ended up not wearing it (was too hot in Texas). But satisfied with our purchase and Glad he will have this for next holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great designs!
customer_reviews.text: Great design and good customer service. The sweater was somewhat large for a size small. I am 5'6 & 150lb and the small was a little big for me, but not too bad. Still looked great. The overall quality is good, but there were some issues with loose threads. However, the seller was quick to respond and resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaDan

customer_reviews.title: FIt's too large
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice shirt, great quality; however, it was too big. I normally wear an XL, this XL was very big on me. I will be returning for a smaller size. Nice shirt though
customer_reviews.author: M Fo

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable! Perfect for the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: This is a superbly-made sweater. I was flabbergasted when I felt the quality of materials, especially at this low price. I'm only sad that this particular sweater would be a bit awkward to wear year-round. Yes, it's THAT comfortable. Size/fit was exactly as advertised. Keep it up, Daisysboutique!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sweater
customer_reviews.text: A little tighter than expected, but stretched out nicely. Soft fit and looked good.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Kuszmaul

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Soft and Festive!!
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and fun to wear...there were only men's sizes ...that was not a problem except for being large in the shoulders. Cute design and details! Looks like a sweater that costs lots more money!
customer_reviews.author: Katie55

customer_reviews.title: "Cute" Ugly Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: I like this sweater and the 3-D affect added by the scarves. The only problem.......more people commented on how "cute" it was rather than being traditionally "ugly"! LOL Still happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DVM95

customer_reviews.title: High quality & perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Sweater is very well made. Nice and thick to keep you warm and quality throughout. As far as fit goes, I often wear Large tshirts and XL long sleeves. This XL fits me exactly as I would want. If anything it might be ever so slightly on the small side so if you can fit both sizes, go with the larger.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ugly Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love my Christmas sweater. It was a little big on my arms, but other than that it fit really well. The price cannot be beat as far as Ugly Christmas Sweaters go.I was a little nervous when I first got in cause the eyes did not seem to be sewn on to the sweater very well, but it has held up to my young daughter grabbing and kicking. I haven't washed the sweater yet, but will edit post once I do to let you know how it holds up to the washing machine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: My son requested a "non-ugly" Christmas sweater which was hard to find! This fit the bill perfectly. It looks great, fit perfectly, and the shawl collar adds a nice touch of class and dressiness.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Adams

customer_reviews.title: They delivered what they promised!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sweater when I saw it on-line and I was completely happy to see that it was exactly what I hoped for! It fits as advertised, is well made and was delivered ahead of the promised date. Well done! I would highly recommend this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: BJW

customer_reviews.title: Too small and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Bought it one size more than what I wear, still way too small and overall quality felt cheap with lots of loose threads. Returned same day it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: SeanB

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought in large and the sweater fit perfectly. Size large normally in all sweaters as I want them to be a little roomy. Everyone thought it was extremely cute
customer_reviews.author: Juicy K

customer_reviews.title: Hysterical, and high quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sweater. My only concern is that it may be a little long in the torso. But otherwise a fantastic addition to my comical Xmas sweater collection.
customer_reviews.author: James E Siegler III

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Sweater
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really cute sweater. I like that it had a scene on the front and the back.
customer_reviews.author: Meow4Milk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent transaction. Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gathering, with ugly sweaters! Ladies said mine was "cute". 1 size up, 2XL rather than XL, perfect fit. Better made than I expected. Great color. Soft. Actually drapes my body; indicates higher quality. Excellent transaction. Received fast. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 150 lb, 5’6” male size Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son last minute. I wasn’t expecting much and was pleasantly surprised. It fit well, maybe a little long, and it is soft and nice quality. My son has an athletic build and is able to wear the small size comfortably with a button up underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Hanii S. Ziehl

customer_reviews.title: Really long sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Really cute sweater and the body of it fits well. The problem is the sleeves which are extremely long. I'm 5'1 and they hung at least 4 inches past my hands even with rolled cuff. Partner is 5'9" still hung off her hands. 6'3" son and the sleeves were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michele E.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Family wanted to do ugly/funny Christmas sweaters so we bought the Christmas Holiday Snowman Pullover. Added just the right amount of fun and festivity to the occasion
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Holiday Party Sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Holiday Party Sweater! A more attractive version of the ugly sweater - ie delightfully tacky instead of actually ugly or offensive - perfect for family friendly Holiday parties!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Handsome Husband!
customer_reviews.text: Fun gift for the holidays that Dad will actually wear! Nice fit and good quality sweater that looked great on my husband! It’s hard to find something that fits nicely and something that isn’t stupid. I’m so glad this sweater worked out well for the holidays for my husband and i’m Sure he will keep it for a few years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: The best sweater!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater exceeded my expectations! It looks like an original sweater that Clark Griswold would have worn! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: i bought my two kids, myself and my husband matching reindeer sweaters in different colors to wear during the holiday season as a little joke. Well my kids LOVE these sweaters. They fit perfectly and are quite warm plus they get a kick out of nose on the sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Men's Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he wore it several times this Christmas season and has enjoyed having it. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ugly Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: This product fit as expected and was perfect for my husband to wear to our family Christmas party. The material was soft and good quality. We have put it away with intentions of pulling it out for next year as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Run very big
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, but the size is ginormous. Ordered M for my husband, thinking it would be loose fit on him. The size that came in looked like XXL. I think even small will be too big for him. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Romantsova

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfortable loved wearing it and bought one for my 11 year old grandson!!! He wore it to school and won prize👏
customer_reviews.author: dday

customer_reviews.title: Quality made sweater
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves how cozy it is. It’s thick, but not an uncomfortable thick that causes you to overheat. He likes the quality of the material and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina R

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and is made of quality material. Looks and feels Fantastic! !
customer_reviews.author: cstingvl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was very nice for the price. I thought it fit bigger than suggested. I am a female smaller frame but can usually fit in men's small and this fit more like a medium. It's still a great purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Buy ONE (1) Size Smaller than Listed!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size L (Large) and the product was more of an X-Large as sleeves are 3-4 inches too long and I would highly recommend buying one size smaller. I needed it for a Halloween Costume and could not return it in time so I am stuck with a sweater too large, Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Nathanson

customer_reviews.title: These are Great..
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is really well made.Looks really expensive ! But Mine was so big I had to return. I would say maybe order a size smaller ?
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Came with a snag in the sweater and returned the ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with a snag in the sweater and returned the item, also noted that this runs very small. So be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: A festive Christmas sweater, very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sweater that fits pretty well. I am 6' tall, weight 210, with a 35" arm length, and the X-Large fits well, sleeves are definitely long enough, as is the body, although it is not a baggy or loose-fit sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Another Review

customer_reviews.title: Order a size or two larger.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. It’s about 1 size too small. I prefer extra room and my 2xl clothes have plenty of extra space. This was form fitting and let’s be honest, no one wants to see that from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: All noses matter
customer_reviews.text: I am too terrified to wash it so I just keep wearing it and putting it back in my closet. Need to keep that nose safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Vals

customer_reviews.title: Gnarly.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Kind of heavy material which is nice because it's pretty warm. Fits perfectly and seems to be high quality. Should last quite a while. The design is exactly as pictured, which is awesome because I work at Subaru and bought this for our Ugly Xmas Sweater day, and this is the perfect theme.
customer_reviews.author: @thebrickshithouse

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Christmas sweater!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a surprise present for my husband for an event we were going to attend. He loved it and it looked great on him. Nice quality too!
customer_reviews.author: B. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and for my husband true to size. Very well made and comfortable. My husband ordered the 3X and it looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Honor Siemann

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: Runs rather small and has an awkward fit (too tight on the sleeves, snug neck, a bit short). If you’re looking for something for a one-time occasion, like an ugly Christmas sweater party, this may be fine. Just be sure you buy a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Ed E. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly for a 5’7 male, sleeves a bit long but no biggie
customer_reviews.author: The Lovely One

customer_reviews.title: It fit ok before cleaning, but the stiching did not allow the sweater to expand. Returned
customer_reviews.text: Nice sweater, but it was too tight with the embroidering of the design around the middle. It fit okay, but after a washing, I was afraid it would shrink beyond the ability to use next season. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Masters

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit big! My boyfriend fits between a small and medium. I got him a medium and it ran more like a medium - large. Thick material and true to image.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley jorge

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 11 of these sweaters in different sizes for family "Ugly Sweater" event... the pre teen boys loved them especially
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: If you have a normal BMI, take 1 size under
customer_reviews.text: I did the measurements and I fit into the Medium section char. With the sweater on, it looks like I took a Large instead of Medium. These are tailored for fatter people. The sweater does not hitch and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Didier

product_meta.title: Daisysboutique Men's Holiday Reindeer Snowman Santa Snowflakes Sweater
product_meta.description: Our Model Mike Wears a Medium, he is 6'1, 178lb, Shoulder 17.7", Chest 38"
feature_bullets: Festive Design, Makes a great gift
Great for your christmas sweater competition
Great for holiday photos, events or parties
Mike wears a Medium, he is 6'1, 178lb, Shoulder 17.7", Chest 38"
